dp:metadata.dc:title: The collectors
dp:metadata.dc:creator: David Baldacci
dp:metadata.dc:publisher: New York, N.Y. : Warner Books Large Print, 2006.
dp:metadata.dc:description: EDITORIAL REVIEW: The four mysterious gentlemen who call themselves the Camel Club are back in action for another thrilling adventure in Baldaccis instant "New York Times" bestseller. When the Speaker of the House is assassinated, the Camel Club finds a chilling connection to another murder.
